data.title: An Analysis of Using Idioms in Michael Connely's The Lincoln Lawyer Movie (2017)
data.meta_description: An Analysis Of Using Idioms In Michael Connelyâ€™s The Lincoln Lawyer Movie (2017) - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an analysis of idiom usage in the 2011 Michael Connelly film "The Lincoln Lawyer". The author examines the types of idioms used in conversations throughout the film. 86 idioms were found total. The most common type was two-word verbs, while idioms using prepositions or adverbs and idiomatic adjective phrases were less frequent. The purpose is to identify and analyze the idioms used to better understand their meaning and role in communication. Keywords examined include idioms, two-word verbs, and figurative expressions.
data.text: An Analysis of Using Idioms in Michael Connely's The Lincoln Lawyer Movie (2017)
